text:
@realDonaldTrump ... Biggest deficit ever, even pre-coronavirus,

hostile foreign trade policies with tariffs,

waffling, incoherent lack of leadership in any domain,

moral bankruptcy,

constant, embarrassing public behavior,

alienation of long-term allies, and capitulation toward enemies,

domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela
